title: A Taste of energy
creator_credit: Edwin Scragg, Colonial Sugar Industry and Scope Films
brief_description: The Australian sugar industry, showing all stages of cane cultivation and harvesting, extraction and refining of sugar. Impressions of life in the sugar producing regions of Queensland and northern New South Wales and the place of sugar in the Australian economy.
creator_credit_for_label: Edwin Scragg, Colonial Sugar Industry and Scope Films
